title: A frutefull treatis of baptyme [sic] and the Lordis Souper of the vse and effect of them, of the worthey and vnworthy receyuers of the souper, necessary to be knowne of all Christen men, which yerely receyue the sacrament.
author: Joye, George, d. 1553.
notes: Imprint from colophon; actual place of publication and printer's name from STC.
Title page marked and stained; lower margins cropped, affecting some signatures.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
